artist: Artist: Tsukioka Yoshitoshi; Author: Kyokutei Bakin; Publisher: Tōkyō Haishi Shuppansha
creditline: The Mary Griggs Burke Endowment Fund established by the Mary Livingston Griggs and Mary Griggs Burke Foundation, gifts of various donors, by exchange, and gift of Edmond Freis in memory of his parents, Rose and Leon Freis
description: burnt orange cover; pages of text; image near beginning of book with group of people gathered in semi-circle on ground in front of small temple building with sad elderly figure seated on its steps, with attendant on verandah; severed heads littered on ground before elderly figure; man hiding behind sign at UL; image near end of figure seated on elevated chair in front of folding screens with two attendants kneeling
medium: Woodblock printed book; ink on paper
portfolio: From The Crescent Moon (Chinsetsu yumiharizuki 椿説弓張月)
title: The Crescent Moon, vol. 10
